name: The Spirit of Halloween
description:
You wake up on a graveyard at midnight, not knowing how you got to this place. It seems that someone else was here because there is a strange boiling cauldron next to you. You look around and examine the environment but whoever setup this cauldron is now gone. The graveyard door is closed and you don't know how too escape. What is this place, why are you here? While you brooding about all this things you stumble about a strange looking Book. Does this contain the answers to your questions? Start this Game and find it out...

The Game is a simple point and click Adventure  where you have to solve a mystery to release the spirit of Halloween.

Estimated play time: 10 Minutes
